remarks: Elimination of four existential quantifiers, using implicit substitution.  (Contributed by NM, 23-Sep-2011.)
statement:
ceqsex4v.1 $e |- A e. _V $.
ceqsex4v.2 $e |- B e. _V $.
ceqsex4v.3 $e |- C e. _V $.
ceqsex4v.4 $e |- D e. _V $.
ceqsex4v.7 $e |- ( x = A -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
ceqsex4v.8 $e |- ( y = B -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
ceqsex4v.9 $e |- ( z = C -> ( ch <-> th ) ) $.
ceqsex4v.10 $e |- ( w = D -> ( th <-> ta ) ) $.
ceqsex4v $p |- ( E. x E. y E. z E. w ( ( x = A /\ y = B ) /\ ( z = C /\ w = D ) /\ ph ) <-> ta ) $.
$d A w x y z $.
$d B w x y z $.
$d C w x y z $.
$d D w x y z $.
$d ch y $.
$d ps x $.
$d ta w $.
$d th z $.
